snippet: The city says it is trying to turn over spaces more quickly, but critics see an effort to squeeze more money out of the meters.
abstract: Santa Monica, Calif, is using new technology that resets the time on each parking meter to zero the moment a car pulls out of a space; city says it is trying to turn over spaces more quickly, but critics see an effort to squeeze more money out of the meters.
lead_paragraph: The city says it is trying to turn over spaces more quickly, but critics see an effort to squeeze more money out of the meters.

headline.seo: Santa Monica Resets Parking Meter System
headline.main: Santa Monica Resets Its Parking Meter System
headline.print_headline: Santa Monica Resets Its Parking Meter System
